issue.title: Changes for [rand.req.eng]

discussion.p: This change follows naturally from the proposed change to seed_seq::randomize in .
In table 104 the description of X(q) contains a special treatment of the case q.size() == 0. This is undesirable for 4 reasons:

ol.li: It replicates the functionality provided by X().
It leads to the possibility of a collision in the state provided by some other X(q) with q.size() > 0.
It is inconsistent with the description of the X(q) in paragraphs p5, p8, and p10 where there is no special treatment of q.size() == 0.
The proposed replacement for seed_seq::randomize given above allows for the case q.size() == 0.

discussion.p: See N2391 and N2423 for some further discussion.

resolution.p: Adopt the proposed resolution in N2423.

issue.note: Kona (2007): The LWG adopted the proposed resolution of N2423 for this issue. The LWG voted to accelerate this issue to Ready status to be voted into the WP at Kona.
